question.title: Will a member of the Trump family be the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024?
question.body:
Resolves **Yes** if one of these individuals is the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024:

 - Donald Trump
 - Donald Trump Jr.
 - Eric Trump
 - Ivanka Trump
 - Tiffany Trump
 - Melania Trump
 - Barron Trump

metadata.source_question: Will a member of the Trump family be the Republican nominee for the US Presidency in 2024?

question.title: Will a Trump family member secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 US Presidential election?
question.body:
The outcome will be **Yes** if any of the following individuals is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential election:

 - Donald Trump
 - Donald Trump Jr.
 - Eric Trump
 - Ivanka Trump
 - Tiffany Trump
 - Melania Trump
 - Barron Trump

question.title: Will Donald Trump be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question may consider new candidates added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

metadata.source_question: Will Donald Trump be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

question.title: Will Donald Trump secure the Republican nomination for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This inquiry will be answered with a **Yes** if Donald Trump is chosen as the nominee by the Republican National Convention for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidate will result in a **No**. This question may take into account candidates who are introduced later on.

For the purpose of this question, the focus is not on who holds the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively about who is selected by the delegates at the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Tucker Carlson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Tucker Carlson is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidate being selected will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

metadata.source_question: Will Tucker Carlson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?

question.title: Will Tucker Carlson be chosen as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Tucker Carlson is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The selection of any other individual will result in a **No** outcome. This inquiry is open to the inclusion of additional candidates beyond those currently mentioned.

For the purpose of this inquiry, the relevant factor is the individual selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention), not who is nominated on the day of the 2024 US election.
